channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Matt Wanchap

item.title: One-liner to check/uncheck every checkbox on a page
item.description: Press F12, click console and paste this in there. [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll(“input”)).forEach(i => i.checked=true)

item.title: jQuery ajax error logging on the server with log4net
